name: Chicken Alfredo
description: An easy recipe to make alfredo sauce, to be used with any type of pasta!

steps.instruction: Add butter and cream to non-stick pan over medium heat until butter is fully melted.
Add garlic, italian seasonings, salt and pepper into pan and stir until mixed.
Simmer and cook for 3-4 minutes until the sauce is thickened.
Once thickened, add parmesan cheese into mixture and stir.
